channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Magical Mermaid-lantis: It's the big Mermaid Sparkle Party in Mermaid-lantis! But when the grumpy Kitty Squiddy tries to ruin the party for everyone, Gabby and Pandy must save the day. (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Weather Machine: Crusher has taken Gabby's Weather Machine and is using it to cheat up a storm! Now the team have to weather the cheats to win and get the machine back once and for all! (S9, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A meteor makes an eel gigantic in 'Mighty Pups Stop a Mighty Eel', then in 'Pups Save a Floating Royal Carriage', Sweetie decides to commandeer the Princess's royal carriage and horse. (S9, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Eddie and Emmy cause trouble in 'Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch', and then in 'Pups Save a Lonely Ghost', Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and tries to help it to make new friends. (S9, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bug Hotel: During another visit to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house, Grandpa takes everyone to show them the new Bug Hotel he is building.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Superhero Party: Pedro loves superheroes. He has a superhero-themed party and Super Potato is one of the guests.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Monkey Has A Cough; Mr. Potato's Fruit & Vegetable Quiz: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Big Hill; Strawberries: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jukebox; Undersea Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Holly: Holly is left in charge when King and Queen Thistle go away on important business, but ruling the Little Kingdom isn't as easy as it looks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Fig's Magic School: Despite protests from the Wise Old Elf, Ben accompanies Holly to her first day at magic school.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Trip to the Museum: The naughty toddlers cause chaos again. Mrs Fotheringill gets zapped back to the stone-age, and Nanny Plum turns everyone into frogs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Books: Queen Thistle reads the children a story, which inspires a question. They can't find the answer in the magic books in the castle, so go instead to the Wise Old Elf in the Great Elf Library.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny's Magic Test: Nanny's magic licence is out of date and in order to get a new one she must pass a test, set by the Wise Old Elf.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Chickens Ride West: King Thistle wants a boiled egg for his breakfast, so the elves decide to deliver the King the chickens from the Elf Farm so he can have an egg whenever he likes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Marshall performs some Dino dentistry in 'Pups Save a Sore Dino', and then in 'Pups Save the Triceratops Tag-Alongs', a sightseeing expedition quickly turns into a wild Dino ride! (S7, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora, Boots, and Benny trek through the rainforest to deliver a cake in 'Tres Leches Trouble', then in 'Wizzle Wozzle Woo', Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Magical Mermaid-lantis: It's the big Mermaid Sparkle Party in Mermaid-lantis! But when the grumpy Kitty Squiddy tries to ruin the party for everyone, Gabby and Pandy must save the day. (S3, ep 13).

channel.desc: Sports Day; Grandpa's Little Train: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Toy Plane; Playing Pretend: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Acorn Day: It's autumn and the Elves and Nanny Plum are busy clearing up all the leaves. Suddenly the squirrels arrive with a mission to store acorns in the Great Elf Tree. Acorn Day has arrived.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Picnic: On a tour of the Elf Factory, the Elf and Fairy children learn about recycling and see how rubbish is re-used. When the factory runs out of material, they set out to find some more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: We find out who can scare Storm in 'Scary Stories', then in 'The Smurf Who Lost His Shadow', Hefty's shadow wants to be free, but once they're separated, they're both in danger. (S4, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots help Dulce the Dragon in 'Learning To Fly', and in 'Queen Swiper', La Reina and Swiper's bodies are switched by Big Red Chicken's magic. Dora and Boots help them switch back! (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A baby T-Rex gets lost in 'Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke', then in 'Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf', Everest joins the patrol for a visit to the jungle, and makes friends with a clumsy calf. (S9, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay in 'Pups Save Apollo', then in 'Pups Save the Hippos', Raimundo's dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The Crew helps Charger fall asleep in 'The Crew Builds Charger a Super Bed', then in 'The Crew Builds a Super Squirrely Whirly Playground', the pups play like Super Squirrely Whirly. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Monster Machine Rescue Team: Blaze must complete three amazing rescues to join the greatest emergency vehicle team in Axle City: the Monster Machine Rescue Team! (S8, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Construction Crew to the Rescue: When Crusher and Pickle are trapped at the top of a rickety tower, Blaze, Stripes and Starla transform into construction vehicles to build a way down. (S4, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Police Boat: Peppa, George and Freddy Fox are mistaken for pirates while sailing on the river with Grandpa Pig, complete with costumes and a Jolly Roger flag.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a fun day in 'Pups Save the Skydivers', then in 'Pups Save the Cupcakes', Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder! (S7, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Paw Patrol searches for missing dancers in 'Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer', and in 'Pups Save a Mayor and Her Mini', Mayor Goodway and niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation. (S9, ep 21.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everybody Sleepover!: Peppa and all her friends are having a sleepover - different friends in each of the apartments in the high street. So they play hide and seek across all the rooms! (S7, ep 33).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walking Bus: The children must walk to school in a walking bus! Miss Rabbit wears a high visibility jacket, leading Peppa and friends in a bus formation. (S7, ep 34).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The VIP: King Leopold has announced he is paying a visit to The Little Kingdom. Everyone is very excited that they have a VIP coming and prepare to welcome him. But King Thistle is feeling left out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mr Elf Takes a Holiday: Mr Elf is overworked so King Thistle sentences him to a holiday. He isn't too pleased. But Mrs Elf and Ben are overjoyed! Meanwhile, Nanny takes over the food deliveries.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Bunty II: Mr Elf has built a new boat to replace the one Big Bad Barry ate. He is nervous when the king commands him to take them on a cruise to a tropical paradise - will Big Bad Barry strike again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig's Book: Mummy Pig has finally finished writing her first book and decides to take it to playgroup to read to the children with unexpected results.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Zoo: Madame Gazelle takes the children on a trip to the Zoo where they get a tour from the zookeepers; Mr Lion, Mrs Crocodile and Mr Giraffe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Outback: The Pig family visit the Kangaroo family in Australia! On their first day they fly into the outback in Mr Kangaroo's aeroplane, have a barbeque and play some cricket with a Koala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Surfing: On their second day in Australia the Kangaroo family take the Pig family to the beach where they try out surfing. George shows off his skills when he's out paddling with Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea? It's Burn's Night and Mrs Bird teaches Paddington about a rare creature called a Wild Haggis.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has an important job to do in 'Paddington's Earth Day Mission', then in 'Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration', everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along. (S3, ep 21).

channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Who is Paddington's Special visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar? // It's the last night of Hanukkah and Mr Gruber's Hanukkiah breaks before he can light the final candle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Windsor Ruby is missing in 'Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case!', then in 'Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe', the Browns set up a takeaway, but it's hard work! (S3, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Chefs: When Boo and their llama BBF, Lara, disagree over what dish to cook for their dolls, Bop suggests that their pretend restaurant have more than one chef. (S1, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse

channel.desc: Tractor; Undersea Party: Two episodes.

channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Francois' pants catch on fire in 'Pups Save the Flaming Flounder', then in 'Pups Make the News', a news crew is in town when Chickaletta accidentally causes a fire in new parkette. (S11, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol

channel.desc: Superheroes: The children are playing a game of superheroes. When Strawberry takes her supervillain role a bit too far, it is up to Elf Man and Fairy Girl to save the day.

channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.desc: King Thistle's Birthday: King Thistle does not want to get any older so decides that no one must celebrate his birthday. But all of the Little Kingdom has been waiting to celebrate.

channel.desc: Lucy's Sleepover: Holly shrinks Lucy and her dog, Rex, down so they can play in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Indoor Adventure: A storm cancels Peppa and her family's adventure plans so they decide to take it inside. Using their imagination, they go sledding, climb a mountain and have a campfire in the attic.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Honey Bees: Ben and Holly visit the bee hive to see how honey is made. Wise Old Elf is the bee keeper and he proceeds to show the children his special way of collecting honey.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf School: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Pet: The Twins really want a pet and Nanny Plum sets about getting them one. She magics them up Pippin the hamster. The Wise Old Elf even brings Pippin a hamster wheel.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Pirate Treasure: When Captain Squid leaves his treasure map in the Little Kingdom, Redbeard the Elf Pirate leads Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum on a treasure hunt.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Great Barrier Reef: Today the family go to work with Mrs Kangaroo on the Great Barrier Reef. While taking in the beautiful views in Mrs Kangaroo's submarine, they find some special treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Boomerang: The holiday is coming to an end but there's still time to play with a Boomerang and make friends with Mr Wallaby. They all have trouble keeping the boomerang under control, though.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Nursery Rhymes: Madame Gazelle and the playgroup are sharing their best nursery rhymes with each other.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington builds a robot in 'Paddington Meets PaddingTron', then in 'Paddington's First Diwali', Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a race against time in 'Paddington and the Solar Eclipse', then in 'Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor', Simi receives an inventor's award, but why does she feel sad? (S3, ep 6).

channel.desc: Monkey See, Monkey Do: Bop and Boo play 'Follow the Leader' with their monkey friends Chika and Chuka during a jungle stop, but the sisters are a bit too keen to stay in charge. (S1, ep 33).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Surprise: Bop and the bunnies' tiger BBF, Garry, compete in a nature hunt, eager to find the coolest thing ever, but Boo comes up the biggest surprise. (S1, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: CatRat's Kitty Fish: Gabby unboxes a fishless fish tank and finds out it's for CatRat's four pet Kitty Fish! When they get loose, Gabby and Pandy join CatRat on a submarine adventure. (S3, ep 18).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Shop; Clubhouse Adventure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save Lizzy's Lemonade Blaze:Mayor Humdinger and his kitties accidentally set Lizzy's Lemonade Stand and parts of Foggy Bottom ablaze. It's up to the pups to extinguish the fires! (S11, ep 21).
